description:
Skia4Delphi is a cross-platform 2D graphics API for Delphi based on Google's Skia Graphics Library (skia.org).

Google's Skia Graphics Library serves as the graphics engine for Google Chrome and Chrome OS, Android, Flutter, Xamarin, Mozilla Firefox and Firefox OS, and many other products.

### Package Parameters
- `/RADStudioVersions=` [Optional] Select the RAD Studio versions do you want to install the Skia4Delphi library. Without this parameter, the installation will be done in all RAD Studio versions detected in the system. If no version of RAD Studio is found on the system, the installation will just extract the files. The parameter value can be one or more versions numbers of RAD Studio separated by comma. The accepted values are:
  - `15.0` - RAD Studio XE7
  - `16.0` - RAD Studio XE8
  - `17.0` - RAD Studio 10.0 Seattle
  - `18.0` - RAD Studio 10.1 Berlin
  - `19.0` - RAD Studio 10.2 Tokyo
  - `20.0` - RAD Studio 10.3 Rio
  - `21.0` - RAD Studio 10.4 Sydney
  - `22.0` - RAD Studio 11 Alexandria
  - `all` - All RAD Studio versions detected in system (default)

  The ".0" can be omitted, so "22" is the same of "22.0".

  **Examples**

  - The command below in powershell will install the library just in RAD Studio 11 Alexandria:
  `choco install skia4delphi --params "/RADStudioVersions=22"`
  - The command below in powershell will install the library just in RAD Studio 10.4 Sydney and RAD Studio 11 Alexandria:
  `choco install skia4delphi --params "/RADStudioVersions=22,21"`
  - The command below in powershell will install the library in all RAD Studio versions detected in system:
  `choco install skia4delphi`


- `/DIR=` [Optional] Set the installation directory. Without this parameter, the installation will be done in `C:\Users\(username)\Documents\Skia4Delphi`

  **Example**

  - The command below in powershell will install the library in folder `C:\Skia4Delphi`:
  `choco install skia4delphi --params "/DIR='C:\Skia4Delphi'"`

### GUI installation

  You can also run the skia4delphi chocolatey package without the silent mode, with the command below in powershell:
  `choco install skia4delphi --notsilent`
summary: Cross-platform 2D graphics library for Delphi based on Google's Skia
author: Paulo César Botelho Barbosa, Vinícius Felipe Botelho Barbosa
